snippet: Rodney Hood had never hit a game-winning shot — at any level. So when he knocked down a big one Friday night, all he could think to do was give a little shoulder-shimmy....
lead_paragraph: Rodney Hood had never hit a game-winning shot — at any level. So when he knocked down a big one Friday night, all he could think to do was give a little shoulder-shimmy.

headline.main: Hood Hits Pull-Up 3 to Give Jazz 103-100 Win Over Mavericks
headline.print_headline: Hood Hits Pull-Up 3 to Give Jazz 103-100 Win Over Mavericks
